schema.name: Bedrock Service
schema.description: Bedrock Service is a simple JSON repeater designed to demonstrate a simple API and be used in test suites requiring JSON responses from a remote host, such as com.brettonw.bedrock.

ok.description: Get an empty response, with status Ok.

ip.description: Get the IP address of the requestor.

host.description: Name of the host the request is to.

echo.description: Repeat the contents of the query.

echo-array.description: Repeat the contents of the query as the first element of an array.

echo-post.description: Repeat the contents of the post-data.

fetch.description: Get the content response from a requested URL.

url.description: Site URL to fetch. The URL may need to be 'escaped' if it contains special characters. Use the unicode hexadecimal equivalent for certain special characters, such as '%3d' for '='.

content.description: Content response from requested site, escaped appropriately.

escape-type.description: Method of escaping/encoding content response to enable it to be enclosed in a JSON tag.
